column17:
Hawai Unisex Hunter Leather Medium Sling Bag (Tan-01) Price: Rs.2299

A sling bag designed out of hunter leather from the brand Hawai. This leather bag is soft at touch and rough at its look. Magnetic button. One roomy compartment. Three zipper pockets. One chamber one phone pouch and one wallet pouch. Adjustable strap 24 inch long. Can be used by both men and women. The portrait orientated bag features a magnetic flap closure and a single interior compartment there is a zipper pocket inside. Outside the compartment a zipper pocket and a pocket without the zip is designed to keep the cards and neccessary documents. As the flap is opened a phone pouch and a pouch to rest your wallet or money within easy yet secured reach. At the back of the bag also a zipped pocket is designed. Therefore this sling bag is roomy for a perfect day out with all your essential stuff in. The attached strap is adjustable making possible to wear it as either a shoulder or cross body bag. Brand name embossed on the flap. This bag is made up of hunter leather which has a rough look but soft at touch. Please note that it does get dirty at first and is susceptible to water spotting in early days in particluar. A the piece ages spots and marks tend to disappear into the burnished patina. The tanning process can be hastened by exposing the leather to sunlight. Beware of the dark denim which can rub off onto light-colored bags.
